New_York.Bowery Savings Bank:
The Bowery Savings Bank of New York City was chartered in May 1834 and is now part of Capital One Bank.


== History ==
The Bowery Savings Bank opened in 1834 at the site of what is now 128-130 Bowery in Manhattan. By 1980 it had over 35 branches located in the boroughs of Manhattan, Brooklyn, and Queens, as well as Nassau and Suffolk counties on Long Island.
